text: Fritz Wintersteller (21 October 1927 - 15 September 2018) was an Austrian mountaineer. He made the first ascent of Broad Peak together with Hermann Buhl, Kurt Diemberger, and Marcus Schmuck in 1957.Broadpeak.org Main page. Accessed 4 July 2010 He was born in Innsbruck, Austria. Wintersteller died on 15 September 2018 at the age of 90. title: Fritz Wintersteller
